strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to communicate between people using the Communications API
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Talk Communication Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget shows how to send and receive data to users running the same gadget on their machine. If you click on a user, they will receive a message box notifying them that you sent data. A Google Talk account is required and the Google Talk client must be running and connected.
strings.SENT_FROM_GADGET: This message was sent from a Google Desktop gadget!
